0.9357868132253669 0.32955718172194476
-0.48432420060097475 -0.8666696048469824

Only the first coordinates coincide with the non-reversed case, after that there is a difference in coordinates
the first coordinate of the 30nObservations (non-reversed) is (0.9520000000000002 0.29600000000000015) and the 
pre last of the reversed is (0.9357868132253669 0.32955718172194476) the dist of this two vectors is 0.03726864460251748

0.03726864460251748 is larger than 0.00833248778223208 (which is the dist calculated after 20 observations). So,
when reversing the error is getting larger for larger observations
